instruction: Generate a short vacation story that takes place in a forest.
output: Alice had always wanted to experience the beauty of a forest, so she decided to plan a week-long trip to one. She rented a cozy cabin in the woods and hiked the winding trails every day. On one particular trail, Alice came across a beautiful river. She watched as the sun glinted off the surface and made rippling rainbow patterns on the shore. She gathered stones from the riverbed and made a serene and tranquil mandala. While exploring the forest, she also stumbled across a hidden meadow where a family of deer grazed peacefully. Alice spent the rest of the vacation meandering and daydreaming, grateful for the opportunity to immerse and appreciate the untouched beauty of nature.
